My Story

Checkpoints and Save Files

  • Pre - 2020

    Adventure Is Out There

    New Objective Received!

    After being a mechanical engineer for several years, I journeyed into unknown territory in hopes of finding a more exciting career in game development.

  • 2020

    The Beginning of a Beautiful Journey Of Learning

    Master's Of Software Acquired!

    After graduating with a master's of software engineering, the journey began to find where I belong in the game development world and how much I could accomplish.

  • 2020 - 2021

    Start-up Fever and Glory

    Leveled Up Street Cred!

    Joining a start-up has its struggles but the payoff was far greater. Full-stack development opened my eyes to all that was possible and pushed me into doubling down my efforts on my game-dev projects.

  • 2021 - 2023

    My First Title - Payday Crime War

    Power and Skill Stat Granted!

    Finally, a break into the game development industry and on my favourite franchise! Working on Payday Crime War was the biggest challenge I have faced yet. But with great challenge comes great knowledge. And with great knowledge comes great ... power.

  • 2023 - Present

    Bigger and Greater Quests - Squad

    Unreal Skill Acquired!

    I move on to working with a larger team on a larger project, Squad! Although C++ proved to be a challenge at first, it was a mountain I had to climb.

  • The Future

    Great Games And More!

    New Game+

Who I Am

Character Backstory

Bassem Younis

Intermediate Programmer @ PopReach Inc.

Currently working as an intermediate game programmer at Offworld Industries, I am a passionate game developer with a love for creative pursuits beyond the gaming world.

In my free time, I enjoy cooking up delicious meals in the kitchen, exploring new recipes and techniques to perfect my culinary skills. I find that cooking is not unlike game development, in that both require a combination of creativity, precision, and attention to detail.

Of course, my biggest passion remains game development, and I am constantly exploring new ideas and technologies to push the boundaries of what is possible. With a unique blend of technical know-how and interpersonal skills, I am confident that I can bring your ideas to life, delivering unforgettable gaming experiences that leave players eager for more.

Looking for a programmer?

Let's chat about how we can make an exceptional gaming experience together.

Contact Me

If you are looking for an experienced game developer who can bring a unique perspective to your projects, let's chat!

Copyright © Bassem's Portfolio 2024

Squad

My second professional game project, Squad! A tactical, multiplayer first-person shooter. As part of the Foundations team of a live product, I was responsible for fixing major bugs, upgrading legacy systems to Unreal Engine 5 and integrating new Unreal Engine features; from Metasounds to Niagara.

  • Offworld Industries
  • July 2023 - Present
  • Game Development

Payday Crime War

My first released title. I was the sole developer of all AI systems on the project and multiple gameplay systems of Payday Crime War, a multiplayer first-person shooter on mobile platforms.

  • PopReach Inc.
  • June 2021 - June 2023
  • Game Development

Portfolio Website

This website! I wanted to share my experiences and projects with the game development community. Developing a website isn't the hardest thing in the world, but on this project i gave myself a one week deadline. And I think my efforts speak for themselves.

  • Personal
  • April 2023
  • Web Development

Shooter Project

A third-person shooter built on the Unreal game engine. The goal of this project was to improve my C++ skills and expand my game development skills into Unreal. I set up the animation blending logic, game loop, enemy AI behaviour and hit scan guns.

  • Personal
  • February 2023 - TBA
  • Game Development

Toon Tanks

A simple tank shooter utilizing both blueprints and C++. Future upgrades coming soon.

  • Personal
  • January 2022 - TBA
  • Game Development

Clash and Dash

To learn the basics of C++ i decided to build a few games using the Raylib library and OpenGL. In this project, we have two arcade style games. A side-scroller (Dasher) where you avoid obstacles similar to flappy bird and a 2d top-down hack and slash (Clash).

  • Personal
  • December 2022
  • Game Development

RPG Project

A point and click RPG with conventional gameplay systems found in many modern video games. It includes melee combat, simple ai, inventory management, abilities, quests and dialogue.

  • Personal
  • November 2022 - TBA
  • Game Development

Blender Adventures

The day i decided to become a game developer, i learned that being able to do 3d modelling was crucial. In this project, I built several models to learn what is possible in 3d modelling software. This includes a modular dungeon environmental asset, a chess set, and the classic pixar lamp with animation.

  • Personal
  • January 2022
  • 3d Modelling And Animation
